text: eeth mata ee deshagunaya allanne naha.

janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage nayakathwayen yuth shri lanka nidahas pakshayath, hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage nakathwayen yuth e්kabaddha wipakshayath athara deshapalana ekangathawak athikara nayakayin depala samagi kirima sandaha aanduwen iwathwu shrilanipa 16 denage kandayame prabalayin dedenaku danatamath mulikathwaya gena atha.

ambattaya, yamse upul wileka ho piyum wileka ho pandera wileka ho atham upul ho piyum ho pandera ho diyehi upanne diyehi wadune, diyen nonagune, diya thulama gili wadunuye da, ee hama aga dakwath mul dakwath sihil diyen themune, hamaparidi theth wuye, piri giye, hama than ma pathira wada gaththe we da, ee wilehi siyalu upulwala ho piyumwala ho panderawala ho sisil diya pathira nogath thanek no wanne da, ambattaya, ese ma mahana theme me kaya ma nishprithika sukhayen themayi, hathpasin themayi.

gedara podi eka gawata ehagedara podi ekiyek awith, “me balannako, oyage eka, mata ohoma ekak nane” kiyaddi, ‘aten poththen eliyata ennath kalin munge thiyena walaththakama’ kiyala thawath owun thula kukusak athi karana eka neweyi karanna oona, hariyata ee wayasata therena widiyata eeka pahadili karala dena eka..

eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya,eksath jathika pakshaya, janatha wimukthi peramuna, shri lanka muslim kongrasaya, ilankeyi thamil arusu pakshaya, prajathanthrawadi pakshaya, kandurata janatha peramuna, ruhunu janatha pakshaya saha janasetha peramuna melesa namayojana bhara dun paksha atharata athulath.
pilithura - aththatama yuddhaya pawathi kalayedi amarikawa uthsaha kala me rata thula sruju madihathwimak karanna.
me para eya poddakwath pakillenne nathiwa kiwwa.
sinhala sangithaya anukarakathwayen mudawa gannata thath kala yugayaki eya.
me hamadeyakma karanne blog kiyawana oyala kagewath rawatimakata ahuwenna nathiwenna.
balanna me siduwima.

janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithumage nayakathwayen thriwidha hamudawe madihathwima matha rata thrasthawadayen mudagena rateathikaranu labu nidahasa , samaya oba obe daruwantath , daruwange daruwantath aarakshakara dimata ekama nil pawurakse shri lanka nidahas pakshaya ha ekata badi katayuthu kala yuthuwa athayi “ shri lanka nidahas paksha jathika sanwidhayaka ha aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha ese prakasha kale hiniduma mathiwarana kottasaye shri lanka nidahas paksha niyojitha sammelanaya amathamini.
yathrawa thawath mitara 10 pamana uda panimin ee me atha haremin eka warama dakunata barawiya.

watalima sandaha mathara polis adhikari ji.ech. marapana mahathage adhikshanaya yatathe sahakara polis adhikari rohan perera mahathage meheyawimen morawaka polis sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka prabhath deshabandhu mahathage mangapenwima yatathe u.po.pa. gayan buddhika, po.sa. rathnawira (22754), po.ැsa. sugathadasa (19756) po.ko. jayathunga (69714) yana niladharihu watalima sandaha sahabhagi wuha.

mehemayi machan awurudu hatharakata kalin gathapu pinthurayak widiyo ekak allagena bola pesbuk eke athana methana mara aathal ekak gannawa..ithin api wage akalata watuna kenek me wage umbaalage aathal kadanakota bolage ahawal eka ridenawa...sori machan...mage duwek neda...man mage duwata eka eka desapalana wesige puthalata wandinna ida thiyanne na...sarla kiyala porawal widiyata oluwa witharak ussan inna unta wandinna ida thiyanneth na...awurudu wisi eka wisi deka welath man kamathi( demapiyan) saha anik un kamathi pol buruwekta law karala bandinna kiyanneth na...meka nirupanayak witharayi..me lamayi thundena aathal ekata gathapu pik ekak..ee lamayi ganikawe korala, wesa ganu korala, pasta gon badu karala dakinne umbaala...umbaalayi as walayi hithwalayi thamayi lokuma walaththaya inne..samahara wita me ganu lamayi thundena ada samajaye loku thanaka athi..man hithanne methana meka kiyawana godak aya dakinna athi ada rate palamu purawasiya wechchi shiranthi madam eda iskole andan giya anduma pitin thibuna pinthure...ee gawuma inagana indala agal kipayak witharayi thiyenne..
